Package albums

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • albums.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    This class defines the Date abstract data type with year, month and day.
    Author:
    William Wang, Joshua Sze

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Date date)
        This month compares two Date abstract data types.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
        Parameters:
        date - a Date object
        Returns:
        BEFORE, SAME_DATE, or AFTER if for date1.compareTo(date2), date1 occurs before date 2, date 1 is the same as date 2, or date1 occurs after date 2, respectively
